Here’s a quick list of some startup and product management resources I find helpful.

Blogroll

  • Paul Graham - Learn from the master.
  • Nir and Far - Some of the best advice re: product psychology out there.
  • Andrew Chen - Growth hacking done right.
  • AVC - Fred Wilson’s blog. Great comments section.
  • Hunter Walk - Thoughts from one of my favorite product people.
  • Steve Blank - Great lean product advice.
  • Jerry Colona - Jerry is the master of CEO psychology.

Product Design - The Psychology of Color

Metrics

  • Metrics Driven Design
  • 3 Rules to Actionable Metrics
  • Startup Metrics for Pirates
  • Lean Analytics - This is a great book on using data to inform product decisionmaking.

Growth - Growth Hacking - Lean Marketing for Startups

Company Building

  • Blakemasters - Notes from Stanford’s CS183 taught by Peter Thiel
  • The meanest thing Paul Graham said to a startup - Â A good little anecdote about the importance of being brutally honest at a startup.
  • Romantic lies about passion and entrepreneurship - pretty personal take on some of the challenges of being a founder.

Raising Money

  • Paul Graham - Investing Trends
  • Party Rounds

Product Management

  • Product Strategy Means Saying No
  • The pyramid model & what it means for PM focus
  • What Is A Product Manager? A Primer For Aspiring Or Junior PMs
  • We are Product Managers
  • 42 Rules to Lead by from the Man Who Defined Google’s Product Strategy
  • A Product Manager’s Job
  • Be a great product leader
  • Good Product Manager, Bad Product Manager
  • How to hire a product manager
  • What distinguishes the top 1% of product managers from the top 10%

Products/Services I Endorse

  • Intercom.io
